collectionMetadata.name: Taxable Companies by Economic Sector, Annual
collectionMetadata.description:
Number of companies, amount of chargeable income and net tax assessed of taxable companies by economic sectors for Year of Assessment (YA)2004 to YA2022. Income is assessed on a preceding year basis. The basis period for any YA is the financial year ending in the year preceding the YA.

* All figures are as at 31 March of the following year for each Year of Assessment (i.e. the YA2017 figures are as at 31 March 2018).

datasetMetadata.name: Taxable Companies By Economic Sector
datasetMetadata.description:
* For YA2009-YA2015, the industries are classified according to Singapore Standard Industrial Classification (SSIC) 2010.   
   (a) Other Goods Industries includes Agriculture & Fishing and Mining & Quarrying.    
   (b) Utilities includes Electricity, Gas & Air-Conditioning Supply, Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management & Remediation Activities.    
   (c) Real Estate & Business Activities includes Real Estate Activities, Professional, Scientific & Technical Activities, Administrative & Support Service Activities.    
   (d) Others includes all other industries such as Education, Health & Social Services, Arts, Entertainment & Recreation, Other Service Activities.    

* The industries are classified according to Singapore Standard Industrial Classification (SSIC) 2015 for YA2016-YA2017; SSIC 2015 (Version 2018) for YA2018 - YA2020.    
   (a) Utilities includes Electricity, Gas, Steam & Air-Conditioning Supply, Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management & Remediation Activities.    
   (b) Other Goods Industries includes Agriculture & Fishing and Mining & Quarrying.    
   (c) Real Estate & Business Activities includes Real Estate Activities, Professional, Scientific & Technical Activities, Administrative & Support Service Activities.    
   (d) Others includes all other industries such as Education, Health & Social Services, Arts, Entertainment & Recreation, Other Service Activities.

* The industries are classified according to Singapore Standard Industrial Classification (SSIC) 2020 from YA2021.

   (a) Utilities includes Electricity, Gas, Steam & Air-Conditioning Supply, Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management & Remediation Activities.    
   (b) Other Goods Industries includes Agriculture & Fishing and Mining & Quarrying.    
   (c) Real Estate & Business Activities includes Real Estate Activities, Professional, Scientific & Technical Activities, Administrative & Support Service Activities.    
   (d) Others includes all other industries such as Education, Health & Social Services, Arts, Entertainment & Recreation, Other Service Activities.

* There will be differences between the Net Tax Assessed (NTA) and the Tax Collection published on data.gov.sg. NTA is the net tax assessed to be payable or repayable by an entity after taking into account allowable tax credits, tax remission, tax rebates and tax deducted at source, for a specific tax period. This might be different from the amount of tax collected as the taxes could be collected or refunded across different Financial Years (FY) due to taxpayers paying their taxes via GIRO instalments or having their past years’ assessments reviewed.
